document.heading: Organ and Bone Marrow Donor Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-211, the “Organ and Bone Marrow Donor Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-701, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 3, 2006, and November 14, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 4, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-536 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-211 became effective on March 6, 2007.
